SELECT A.DRV_ID , A.DRV_NM , CONVERT(AES_DECRYPT(A.PHONE, HEX(SHA2('TRACOM', 512))) USING UTF8) PHONE , DATE_FORMAT(A.EPLY_DATE1, '%Y-%m-%d') EPLY_DATE1 , A.BUS_DIV , B.COMP_NM
FROM BMS_DRV_MST A LEFT JOIN BMS_TRANSCOMP_MST B ON A.COMP_ID = B.COMP_ID

SELECT A.REP_ROUT_ID , A.DRV_ID , B.DRV_NM , CONVERT(AES_DECRYPT(B.PHONE, HEX(SHA2('TRACOM', 512))) USING UTF8) PHONE , DATE_FORMAT(B.EPLY_DATE1, '%Y-%m-%d') EPLY_DATE1 , B.BUS_DIV , C.COMP_NM
FROM BRT_REP_ROUT_DRV_CMPSTN A LEFT JOIN BMS_DRV_MST B ON A.DRV_ID = B.DRV_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_TRANSCOMP_MST C ON B.COMP_ID = C.COMP_ID WHERE A.REP_ROUT_ID = #{REP_ROUT_ID}
